summary: This document is a search and seizure warrant issued for Little Saint James Island in the U.S. Virgin Islands. It outlines the premises to be searched, the items to be seized related to sex trafficking offenses, and the authority granted to law enforcement officers to execute the warrant.

persons.name: Ruth Miller
persons.context: Ruth Miller is the judge who signed the search warrant for Little Saint James Island.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is identified as the primary subject of the search warrant, with evidence sought related to his alleged sex trafficking activities.

connections.description: Ruth Miller issued a search warrant related to the allegations against Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Search Warrant Issued
events.description: A search warrant was issued for Little Saint James Island to search for evidence related to sex trafficking offenses.

locations: Little Saint James Island, U.S. Virgin Islands
keyFacts: The search warrant was issued for Little Saint James Island to gather evidence related to sex trafficking offenses.
The warrant allows for the seizure of various electronic devices and documents related to Jeffrey Epstein.
The execution of the warrant was authorized to occur on or before August 24, 2019.
The warrant includes provisions for delayed notification to the person whose property is being searched.
Multiple structures and items on the island are described in detail for the search.
